p: Date in FigureÂ (4) revealed that thyme oil at 500 mg/l had a maximum value of total sugar content in dry leaves was (0.88 mg/gm D.W.), compared with the control and other treatments followed by clove oil at 250 mg/l recorded (0.75 mg/gm D.W.). In contrast, the control treatment (distilled water) recorded the minimum values of total sugar content (0.47 mg/gm D.W.).
